MUKANDA WA YAKOBO
John S. Robertson
Table des matières abrégée :
Table des matières détaillée :
Yakobo udi ufundila "bisamba dikumi ne bibidi badi bena tshimuangi". Bena tshimuangi bakadi Bena Yuda, bakadi bashikama mu maloba a bungi.
Mu matuku a kumpala a ekeleziya bena kuitabuja ba bungi bakalamata ku malu bualu bua mikenji ya Mose, bu mu Bienzedi 21:18-20.
Ba bungi kabakajingulula ne, Tshipungidi tshia kumpala ne kupa kua mikenji kudi Mose ku Mukuna wa Sinai, "tshidi tshilua tshia kale ne tsh
... (20179 chars skipped) ... 
 ludi lutemeshibua nc kapia ka ku Ngena. 3:3-6
Mu bufuki bua Nzambi, nyama ya pa buloba kayena mimanye mua kutumbisha Mufuki yabo kadi bantu badi bualu bukuabo. “Mu dituku diakafuka Nzambi bantu mu tshifua-nyikiji tshiende, wakabafuka mulume ne mukaji; wakaba-sankisha, wakabidika ne Adama, mu dituku diakabafukeye” (Genese 5:1,2).
Nzambi wakafuka Adama ne Eva bua butumbi buende ne bua disanka diende, wakayikilangana nabo mu budimi wa Edene. “Yehowa wakayikila ne Mose mpala pa mpala bu mudi muntu 
... (20179 chars skipped) ...
 wende wakambila bantu bende ne, Nulue ne tshilulu tshidi tshitambe buimpe, numuluatshishetshi; numuele kakanu ku munu ne bisabata ku makasa. Nulue ne muana wa ngombe udi ne manyi, numushipe, tudie bietu, tusanke bietu, bualu bua muana wanyi ewu wakadi mufue, udi ne muoyo kabidi; wakadi mujimine, wakamueneka. Baka-banga kusanka” (Luka 15:17-24).
“Wewe neundeshe njila wa muoyo.
Tshiuwidi tshia masanka tshidi pabuipi nebe;
masanka adi mu tshianza tshiebe tshia balume
tshiendelele” (Musambu 16:11).

Cyamu kampanda civwa cinyanguke munda mwa mootêr. Bu mumvwa mwende nkayanyi, ciyi nansha ne mulongolodi, même mwine kuditwa mu dilongolola dya mpane ne (...)

MATAYI 27:1-11 MÂKO 15:1 LUKA 22:66–23:3 YONE 18:28-35
BADI BALUMBULUISHA YEZU MU DINDA KUMPALA KUA TSHILUMBULUIDI TSHINENE
YUDASA ISAKALIOTE UKEBA KUDIOWA
BADI BATUMA YEZU KUDI PILATO BUA KUMUKOSELA TSHIBAWU
Butuku bukavua pa kutshia pavua Petelo muvile Yezu bua musangu muisatu. Bena ku Tshilumbuluidi tshinene mbajikije tshilumbu tshiabu tshia mafi ne mbatangalake. Mu Ditanu mu dinda, badi badisangisha kabidi bua kuenza bu ne: mikenji ivua mianyishe tshivuabu benze butuku. Badi baya ne Yezu kum
... (1538 chars skipped) ... 
ue avua muinshi, kupandikawu.—Bienzedi 1:17, 18.
Tutshivua patshiatshia pavuabu benda baya ne Yezu ku dibalasa dia Ponsio Pilato. Kadi bena Yuda bavua baye nende kuntuaku bakabenga bua kubuela. Bavua bela meji ne: dituilangana dia nanku ne bantu ba mu Bisamba bia bende divua mua kubavuija bakoya. Bu bobu benze nanku kabavua mua kukumbana bua kudia biakudia bia mu dituku dia 15 ngondo wa Nisana, dituku dia kumpala dia Tshibilu tshia mampa kaayi mela Luevene, tshivuabu bamona bu tshitupa tshia Pas
... (1538 chars skipped) ...
amba ne: “Udi webeja bualu ebu bilondeshile wewe nkayebe, anyi bantu bakuabu mbakuambile bualu buanyi?”—Yone 18:33, 34.
Bu muvua Pilato kayi ne bijadiki bia malu a Yezu, kadi ujinga bua kuamanya, wakandamuna ne: “Meme tshiena muena Yuda to, ki mmuomu?” Wakasakidila ne: “Bena tshisamba tshienu ne bamfumu ba bakuidi ke bavua bakufile kundi. Uvua muenze tshinyi?”—Yone 18:35.
Pavua Yezu muandamune Pilato wakimanyina pa Bukalenge, ne kakuyi mpata, malu avuaye muambe akakemesha Pilato bikole menemene.

Bible udi wakula bua bamue bantu bavua ne bukole bavua bakengesha bavua batekete. Tudi mua kuvuluka tshilejilu tshia Nabota. * Ahaba mukalenge wa mu Isalele wa mu bidimu bia 900 kumpala kua bikondo bietu ebi, wakalekela mukajende Izebele ushipesha Nabota ne bana bende ba balume bua mukalenge angate budimi bua mvinyo bua Nabota. (1 Bakelenge 21:1-16; 2 Bakelenge 9:26) Bua tshinyi Nzambi mmulekele bantu benza mudimu bibi ne bukokeshi buabu mushindu eu?
Bualu bua mushinga mutudi mua kukuata mbua se
... (918 chars skipped) ... 
: bu Nzambi muenze bua malu a tshikisu a bakokeshi aba kaenzeki, mu bulelela, mêyi ende kaavua alua a dishima anyi?
Vuluka kabidi ne: Satana uvua muambe ne: bantu badi benzela Nzambi mudimu anu padibu bimpe. (Yobo 1:9, 10; 2:4) Bu Nzambi ukuba basadidi bende ku malu onso a tshikisu, kavuaku ukuluka mu buteyi bua Satana anyi? Anyi bu Nzambi ukuba mutendeledi wende yonso ku malu a tshikisu, kavuaku ulua muena dishima munene anyi? Bu bukubi bua mushindu eu buikalaku, bantu ba bungi bavua mua kuela 
... (918 chars skipped) ...
endelele.
Buibidi, Nzambi udi utujadikila ne: neajikije dikengeshangana dionso. Mushindu uvuaye muele Ahaba ne Izebele patoke, mubalumbuluishe ne mubanyoke ne munyoke kabidi bantu ba bungi ba bu bobu, udi utujadikila ne: neanyoke benji ba malu mabi dimue dituku. (Musambu 52:1-5) Nzambi mmutulaye kabidi ne: mu katupa kîpi emu, neumbushe malu mabi onso bua bantu badi bamunange. * Muena lulamatu Nabota ne bana bende nebamonangane mu mparadizu pa buloba muikala kamuyi dikengeshangana.—Musambu 37:34.

Ngumu ya dilolo
Kinshasa : mulombodi wa AssNat udi mu luendu lua mudimu mu ditunga dia Egypte . muaba ewu ne muinenda wa ditunga dia egypte bavua batua tshiala pa mukanda wa diuvuangana pankatshi pa bimamuenda wa bukalenga bia matunga abidi aa
Bunia : bua tshibuashi buashi tshidi ku mikalu ya ditunga mu imua territoire mu polovense wa ituri , ba mfumu ba kabukulu bimana kulu balomba dizola dia mikalu bua kupumbisha dibuela dia basalayi ba matunga menyi .
Bandundu : ku mai ndombe , nzubu munena wa lukanu wa Iyombe ku Inongo munianguka bikola . bena lukanu bangata bia kudia ne manga. Nanku mulombodi wa nzubu wa lukanu udi uloma didibuinka dia balombodi .

Bala ku Enternete anyi ambula nimero ya ndekelu ya Tshibumba tshia Nsentedi ne Réveillez-vous !, bibejibeji ne mikanda mikuabu idi ilonda eyi.
Teleja tshianana dibala dia mikanda yetu mu miakulu ya bungi. Tangila anyi ambula video mu miakulu ya bungi, kusangisha ne ya mu miakulu ya tumama.
Sungula muakulu mu kazubu ka muakulu, pashishe tuaku pa Keba bua kumona mikanda ne forma bidi mu muakulu au.

“MUKAJI.” Eu ke mushindu uvua Yezu ubikila bantu bakaji imue misangu. Tshilejilu, pavuaye muondope muntu mukaji uvua mutekete ne mukobame munkatshi mua bidimu 18, wakamuambila ne: “Mukaji, udi musuludibue ku butekete buebe.” (Luka 13:10-13) Yezu wakenza mudimu ne ngakuilu uvuabu bangata bu wa bukalanga tshikondo atshi pavuaye muyukile ne mamuende. (Yone 19:26; 20:13) Kadi, kuvua ngakuilu mukuabu uvua uleja bukalanga ne malu makuabu.
Mu Bible, mbenze mudimu ne ngakuilu kampanda udi uleja luse ne 
... (756 chars skipped) ... 
akakama diakamue! Mukaji eu uvua wela meji ne: uvua mua kuya muntu kayi mumumone, kadi Yezu wakebeja ne: “Nnganyi udi mundenge?” (Luka 8:45-47) Dîba adi, buôwa ne luzakalu biakamukuata, kudielaye kumpala kua Yezu, “e kumuambila malu onso.”—Mâko 5:33.
Bua Yezu kutukija mukaji eu, wakamuambila ne bulenga buonso ne: “Kolesha muoyo muananyi wa bakaji!” (Mat. 9:22) Bilondeshile bamanyi ba malu a mu Bible, badi mua kuenza mudimu ne muaku wa mu tshiena Ebelu ne wa mu tshiena Greke udibu bakudimune ne: 
... (756 chars skipped) ...
amana kungambila malu onso awakenzela mamuenebe [Naomi, mukaji mukamba]. Yehowa akufute bua mudimu webe.’—Luta 2:8-12.
Bushuwa, Yezu ne Boaza mbashile bakulu bena Kristo tshilejilu tshimpe. Imue misangu, bakulu babidi badi mua kutuilangana ne muanetu wa bakaji udi dijinga ne mibelu ya mu Bible ne dikankamija. Bakulu bobu bamane kusambila bua kukeba buludiki bua Yehowa ne bateleje muanetu wa bakaji eu ne ntema yonso, nebapete mushindu wa kumukankamija ne kumukolesha ne Dîyi dia Nzambi.—Lomo 15:4.

Lionel udi wamba ne: “Mvua ngela meji ne: kudi miaba isatu idi muntu mua kuya padiye ufua: mu diulu, mu iferno anyi mu mpurgatoriyo. Mvua mumanye ne: tshivua anu muntu muimpe bua meme kuya mu diulu anyi muntu mubi bua kuya mu iferno. Tshivua anu mumanye bimpe tshidi tshienzeka mu mpurgatoriyo to. Tshitu muanji kubala bualu bua mushindu eu mu Bible to. Kadi mvua ngumvua anu bantu babiakula.”
Fernando udi wamba ne: “Bavua bandongeshe ne: bantu bonso badi bafua batu baya mu diulu, kadi kabivua anu 
... (953 chars skipped) ... 
mu tshimfuanyi udi muntu kayi wela meji anyi wenza mudimu. Mmunyi muvua Yobo muntu wa lulamatu umona muaba wa bafue? Uvua mujimije bintu biende bionso ne bana bende bonso mu dituku dimue, pashishe kupetaye disama dikole dia mabuba amujuka pa mubidi mujima. Wakasengelela Nzambi ne: “Unteke nansha mu muaba wa bafue [“mu iferno” bilondeshile nkudimuinu wa bena Katolike wa Douay], unsokokemu.” (Yobo 1:13-19; 2:7; 14:13, MMM) Bushuwa Yobo kavua wela meji ne: muaba wa bafue uvua iferno wa kapia, muaba
... (953 chars skipped) ...
fu. Tshilejilu, udi wamba ne: Davidi ne Stefano bantu ba lulamatu ‘bakalala tulu mu lufu.’—Bienzedi 7:60; 13:36.
Nunku nditekemena kayi didiku bua bafue? Nebajukaku ku tulu etu anyi?
^ tshik. 7 Mu Nkudimuinu wa bulongolodi bupiabupia, tshiambilu tshia ne: “Muaba wa bafue” ntshifumine ku muaku “Sheol” wa mu tshiena Ebelu ne “Hades” mu tshiena Greke. Mu imue nkudimuinu ya Bible badi bakulamu bua muaku “iferno,” kadi lungenyi lua muaba kampanda wa kapia udibu bakengeshila bafue ki ndua mu Bible to.

Balongi ba mu Iniversite wa Kinshasa ne tshibambalu tshia malu a mikenji bakalongolola difila dia mukanda udi ne tshiena-bualu tshia ne: “Rwanda, assassin sans frontières”, mu Ditanu dia 11 ngondo 5 wa 2023 mu nzubu wa Monekoso mu nzubu wa tulasa tua muomumue.
Munkatshi mua mêba matue ku abidi, mumanyishi wa malu a ditunga dijima eu ne mufundi wa mukanda eu bakayukila ne balongi bavua balue ba bungi. Bena mu biro ebi bavua bela nkonko bua bukubi bua mufundi wa mukanda eu ne malanda ende ne ditun
... (1600 chars skipped) ... 
muntu muimpe, wa disanka ne wa meji a bungi. Uvua munange bamanyishi, ne bavua bamuenzela malu mimpe.
Bua lukonko elu, mmunyi muvuabu bakidile mukanda eu ku Ouest, nangananga mu Grande-Bretagne? Michela wakaleja ne: uvua munyange malu.
“Bantu badi ne mmuenenu mishilangane bualu Paul Kagame ne mbulamatadi wende mbapeshe bantu ba pa buloba lumu luimpe lua ditunga dia Rwanda mu mishindu yonso. Kadi kabiena nanku to. Budikadidi kabuena kuoku to. Misangu yonso batu balongolola masungula. Udi upeta bi
... (1600 chars skipped) ...
uishe balongi.
Panyima pa Kinshasa, udi uya mu Bruxelles lumingu ludi lulonda bua kuyukila ne bena mu Congo ne bena mu Rwanda bua mukanda wende.
Tudi ne bua kuvuluka ne: Michela Wrong uvua mumanyishi wa Reuters ne wa Financial Times. Too ne ku tshikondo atshi, udi mufundi wa mikanda itanu, munkatshi muayi mudi ¢ Rwanda, assassins sans frontières ¢ mupatula kudi Editions Max Milo mu 2021 (Anglais) ne mu 2023 (French). Mukanda eu udi ne mêyi a mbangilu a kudi Stephen Smith.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

“Dishintulula dia Mikenji ya Ditunga “Mulongeshi André Mbata muena tshididi dia USN udi ulomba bantu bua disulukana dia tshiji ne udi ulaya ne: mu katupa kîpi emu nebalupulule lungenyi lua bamanyi mu tshilumbu etshi “.
USN -Union sacrée de la Nation-, ku bukokeshi bua mufundi wende wa kashidi, Mulongeshi André Mbata, udi wenza mudimu wa muakuidi wapi kasumbu Aka ka Nsangilu wa mfumu wa Ditunga wakamanyisha dilolo dia lelu, dia 30 ngondo wa tshiteme 2024, dipingana diende mu malu a tshididi.
Mufu
... (380 chars skipped) ... 
ki eu, mufundi wa mu dîku dia mfumu wa ditunga, Mulongeshi André Mbata, wakakula bua mudimu uvuabu bamupeshe kudi mfumu wa ditunga.
Mu tshikondo tshibi etshi, bua tshilumbu tshikole tshia dikudimuna dia mikenji ya ditunga, Mulongeshi Mbata udi ulomba bantu bonso bua kuikala ne lutulu. Ke bualu kayi udi ulongolola mpungilu mu mbingu ibidi eyi bua kupatula tshibejibeji tshidi tshiakula bua tshilumbu etshi tshidibu bakula kudi bamanyi ba malu a tshididi.
Kadi udi uleja kabidi ne: badi mua kushintul
... (380 chars skipped) ...
 tshikondo ne mukanda wa mikenji ya tshisumbu tshia tshididi etshi, sekretere wa Union Sacrée pour la Nation wakaleja ne: bukokeshi bunene bua bena tshididi ba mu dîku edi ke budi ne bua kuikala bua kumpala.
Mulongeshi André Mbata wakaleja ne: lelu eu kudi bisumbu bia tshididi bipite pa 612 ne bisumbu bia tshididi bitue ku 48. Ne buobumue bua tshijila ebu budi buenda butamba kuvula mu tshitupa tshijima tshia ditunga. Mufundi eu udi wamba ne: bantu badi mua kubuela mu malongolodi a nunku.
Kabongo

- GOMA: bena Société civile mbasaka ne menji mangata mu tshifufu tshivua tshikungija ba mfumu ba etats major ya biluilu bia congo, rwanda, buundi , ouganda ne tanzanie ne ditunga ne ditunga ne diluisha ku mukalu kua ditunga dienda . kadi mulombodi wa FCC yeya ki musnaka to . Nehemie muilanya udi uvuija ne biluilu ebi bia matunga aa bidi mua kuluangana mu ditunga dia congo .
- Lubumbashi:Néhémie Mwilanya, mulombodi wa midimu ya FCC ne musungula mu territoire wa Fizi, mu polovense wa sud kivu , Sud Kivu udi ne dipampakana bua kuvua menji a se biluilu bia matunga adi mutumba bilua bua kuluisha baluma ba mvita mu ditunga dia congo .
- Bunia:Mu Ituri, bena tshisamba tshia ba Bindi badi balomba kudi bukalenga bua congo bua kuya ne bualu bua dinienga ne ditekakesha dia bingoma bia baluma ba mfita ba frpi panshi .
- Kinshasa:Mu tshimenga tshia Kinshasa, kapia nkabudika mu bibambalu bia kadiomba ka Canal Kin Télévision ne CCTV.
- Kisangani: Mu ngumu eyi ne tuakula kabidi bua didifila dia bitupa bishila shilangana mu polovense wa tshopo bua diluisha disama dia malaria didi dishipa 38% bia bantu mu polovense ewu.
- Beni:Ku Nord Kivu, mu luidi lua diluisha ebola bena Fonds des Nations Unies pour la Population, UNFPA, udi ulongesha ebna malu a bukola bua mubidi nanga nanga ba mamu badi balelesha bua kuenza mudimu wabu mu bukubi bonsu .

Yoobo baadi muleeshe lukumiino mu ngobesha y’Efile Mukulu ya kumubusha ku lufu
Yoobo bafubiishe kileshesho kya mutshi—pangi wa olive—bwa kuleesha byadi mushinkamishe pabitale ngobesha y’Efile Mukulu ya kumubusha ku lufu
Mutshi wa olive aupalakashaa mishi yao mu nsenga, yaya mishi ayiukwasha bwashi sunga beutshiba, kishishi kyao akishipuka. Mwanda wa mishi yao ikii ibishi, mutshi aushipuka dingi

Esipania, udi ditunga dia ku Sud-Ouest kua Mputu ne dia ku Nord kua Afrike.[11][h] Ndi ditunga dinene dia ku Sud kua Mputu ne ditunga dia binayi didi ne bantu ba bungi mu matunga a ku Mputu. Tshitupa tshia ditunga edi tshidi tshienza tshitupa tshinene tshia Peninsula wa Ibérie ne tshidi kabidi ne bidiila bia Canaries bidi mu Mbuu wa Atlantique, bidiila bia Baléares bidi mu Mbuu wa Mediterane ne bimenga bia Ceuta ne Melilla bidi mu Afrike. Tshitupa tshia Espagne tshidi ku Nord ne ditunga dia France, dia Andorre ne dia Bay de Biscaye; ku Est ne ku Sud ne Mbuu wa Méditerranée ne Gibraltar; ne ku Ouest ne ditunga dia Portugal ne Mbuu wa Atlantique. Tshimenga tshinene tshia mu ditunga dia Espagne ntshia Madrid, ne mu bimenga bikuabu binene mudi Barcelona, Valencia, ne Zaragoza.

Judith Sumwina udi ne bua kuya mu Kananga, mu provense wa Kasaï-Central, mu dia matuku isatu ngondo wa muanda mutekete bua kutuadijilula mudimu wa dibaka dia njila wa Kananga-Kalamba-Mbuji.
Mu lumingu lushale, ngovena wa provense eu wakanyisha dilua dia bantu aba kudi balombodi ba bimvundu bia tshididi ne ba basalayi ba mu Kananga. Moïse kambulu wakalomba bantu bonso bua kufilabu dibikila dia disanka kudi ministre wa kumpala Judith Sumwina.
Mudimu wa njila wa Kananga-Kalamba-Mbuji uvua mutuadibue kudi mulombodi wa ditunga dia congo Félix Tshisekedi mu dia 10 ngondo muisambombo wa 2022. Tshisumbu etshi tshidi tshiamba ne: katshitu tshianji kuenza bualu nansha bumue bua mushindu eu to.
Tshikondo atshi, tshibambalu tshia Gouverneur Job Kuyindame tshiakasaka kabidi bantu bua kufila dolare miliyo 40 bua kuibaka njila au.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

La localité de Mwamba-Mbuyi, située à 30 km du centre-ville de Kananga, manque d’eau potable en quantité suffisante pour répondre aux besoins de toute la population de cette contrée. La congrégation catholique des serviteurs des pauvres, présente à Mwamba-Mbuyi, l’a dit ce jeudi à une équipe de la Monusco en visite dans cette localité.
Cette localité ne compte qu’une seule source d’eau potable pour des milliers d’habitants et l’approvisionnement donne souvent lieu aux disputes, affirme le curé d

limiter à dénoncer seulement en tendant la main à un Etat assez démissionnaire. Nous sommes tous fils ressortissants de cette terre. Evèque, prêtre, religieuse, ministres, professeurs,… Occupons-nous de « Kwetu », bu nwenu baswe.

... (1468 chars skipped) ...
a histoire wa ditunga dyetu dya Kasai. Biwikala musue, tudi mwa kukangula rubrique ewu mu http://www.grandkasai.com. Kadi wamanya ne meme tshyena ne dimanya diabungi mu leseke elu to.
Wa tatu, lungenyi lwebe kalwena lubi nansha. Nengambile bantu, bwa musangu udi kumpala, pa bidi bitangila mwakulu wa ciluba. Kwakalwawu, bawakudi bawu ba ku dibele, misoko idibu ba wakula mu ditunga ne pampenge padi, ngikadilu wawu mpindiewu ne mabuwa adibu mawela kudi batontolodi. Kalumbandyaku bwa lungenyi lwebe.

« Muntu kakuikala ne muoyo anu bua bidia nkayabi, kadi bua mei onso adi alupuka munda mua Nzambi » (Lumu luimpe luakafundabu kudi Luka 4. 4).
Edi ndiandamuna dia Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto kudi Satana muteyanganyi, didi divuluija bena kuitabusha ne, kudisha kua muoyo wa buana bua Nzambi udi munda muabu, ne kudiunda kuabu kua mu nyuma, kudi kufuma ku dibala dilondangane ne dia ku dituku ku dituku dia Dî dia Nzambi.
Bua kukankamika ne kulombola dibala edi, dipungila dipiadipia, tshitupa tshibidi

ibua mu Ikonio – didi dipatula dikema dinene munda mua bantu aba badi kabayi banji kuitabuja. Badi balua bua kukukuila bantu aba (bapostolo) bu ba nzambi (dieux), bakakebabu kushipa dituku diakushala kunyima. Kumpala kua bapôstolo, bualu ebu buakadi butambe kuikala bubi. Buowa buakabakuata, badi balomba batendeledi ba mpingu aba bua kukoma nyima kudi mpingu, ne kutangila kudi Nzambi wa muoyo (fuany. 12. 22, 23).

Alingete wakamanyisha ne: bavua bapeshe balongi bintu bia kulonga nabi.

CENCO ne bena l’ECC badi balomba CENI bua kujingulula tshilumbu tshia miaba idi kayiyi mu muaba mifunda bantu bua kakanda ka masungula.
Tshisumbu tshia CENCO ne tshia CECC tshidi tshilomba CENI bua kujingulula tshilumbu tshia miaba ya dibala idibu kabayi bapete mu buloba, idibu bafunde kudi tshisumbu etshi. Udi kabidi umulomba bua kulongolola ne lukasa luonso ne mu mishindu yonso bintu bia mushinga bidibu bafila bua kumanya ne kufunda bantu badi basue kusungula bantu .

CHEIKH ANTA DIOP mmulelamu matuku 29 a ngondo wa dikumi ne mwibidi, tidimu tia 1923, mu musoko waCaytou, mu ditunga dya Sénégal. Uvwa mulonga tulasa twa bungi, mushinda mukandamishindu yonso : shimi nyeye, fizika nyeye, anthropologie katushadidi, toone mwa kashindaye mamanya manene a bafike ba mu mpata ya Nile (égyptologie),pamwe ne philosophie, sociologie… Shushukulu ANTA DIOPwakakuma kapundu ka nswa panshi pakapatulaye bipeta bya makebulula endamatwe : kumanyisha bukwa bisamba ne bena Kame ba kale bavwa bafikedikoba ; bobo ke bakatwadila bukwa bisamba bukwa mamanya onso masanganteta. Kujandula mwanda eu mishindu yonso too ne mwakafikaye kuleja mudi mwakulu wa bena mumpata ya…

Ntshinyi tshidi tshisaka bantu ba bungi bua kukonkonona dikalaku dia Mufuki?
Kukadi bidimu bitue ku 3 000, mufundi wa tusala kampanda wa kafunda ne: “Ndi muenjibue mu mushindu wa dikema udi wenza buôwa.” (Musambu 139:14, NWT) Paudi utangila mushindu udi muana ukola kumbukila ku mukuji umue, kabienaku bikukemesha anyi? Bantu ba bungi badi bitaba ne: bintu bidi ne muoyo mbienza kudi Mufuki kampanda.—Bala Musambu 139:13-17; Ebelu 3:4.
Eu udi mufuke diulu ne bidimu ne buloba budi bantu basombe ke udi mufuke kabidi muoyo. (Musambu 36:9) Uvua muyukile ne bantu bua kutumvuija tshidiye.—Bala Yeshaya 45:18.
Tuetu bantu tudi bafumine ku nyama anyi?
Mu mishindu ya bungi, bitupa bia mubidi wetu bidi bipetangana ne bia nyama. Bidi nanku bualu Mufuki uvua mufuke bantu ne nyama bua kuikalabu ne muoyo pa buloba. Uvua mudianjile kufuka muntu kayi mufumine ku nyama, kadi mufumine ku buloba.—Bala Genese 1:24; 2:7.
Bantu mbashilangane ne nyama mu mishindu minene ibidi. Wa kumpala, bantu badi ne mushindu wa kumanya malu, kunanga ne kunemeka Mufuki. Muibidi, nyama kayivua mifukibue bua kuikala ne muoyo tshiendelele to, kadi bantu bavua bafukibue bua kuikala ne muoyo tshiendelele. Kadi lelu, bantu bonso mbapiane lufu bualu muntu wa kumpala wakabenga bulombodi bua Mufuki.—Bala Genese 1:27; 2:15-17.

Nzambi ke udi ukebesha makenga anyi?
Udi mua kuandamuna bishi?
Eyowa
Tòo
Pamuapa
Tshidi Bible wamba
‘Bualu ebu kabuikadi kudi Nzambi bua yeye kuenza malu mabi, anyi bua Wa Bukole Buonso kuenzaye bibi!’ (Yobo 34:10) Nzambi katu ukebesha malu mabi ne makenga atudi tumona pa buloba to.
Mmalu kayi makuabu atudi tulonga mu Bible?
Satana Diabolo, “mukokeshi wa buloba ebu” ke mukebeshi munene wa makenga.—Yone 14:30.
Makenga ne malu mabi atu misangu ya bungi afumina kabidi ku mapangadika mabi atu bantu bangata.—Yakobo 1:14, 15.
Makenga kaakujika anyi?
Bamue bantu badi bamba ne: bantu badi mua kujikija makenga ku diambuluisha dia madikolela abu, eku bakuabu bamona ne: malu kaakushintuluka ne kulengelawu bikole to. Wewe udi wela meji kayi?
Tshidi Bible wamba
Nzambi neajikije makenga. “Lufu kaluakuikalaku kabidi, nansha madilu, nansha miadi, nansha bisama kabiakuikalaku kabidi.”—Buakabuluibua 21:3, 4.
Mmalu kayi makuabu atudi tulonga mu Bible?
Nzambi neenze mudimu ne Yezu bua kujikija makenga adi diabolo mukebeshe.—1 Yone 3:8.
Bantu bimpe nebasombe mu ditalala pa buloba bua kashidi.—Misambu 37:9-11, 29.

BIBLE kêna utamba kuakula bua muanjelu Mikaele to. Kadi misangu yonso idibu bamutela, udi wenza anu bualu kampanda. Tshilejilu, mu mukanda wa Danyele, Mikaele udi uluangana ne banjelu babi; mu mukanda wa Yuda, udi ukokangana ne Satana; mu Buakabuluibua, udi uluangana ne Diabolo ne bademon bende. Padi Mikaele uluila bumfumu bua Yehowa ne uluangisha baluishi ba Nzambi, udi wenza anu tshidi dîna diende diumvuija: “Nnganyi udi bu Nzambi?” Kadi Mikaele eu nnganyi?
Bamue bantu batu ne mêna a bungi. Ts
... (439 chars skipped) ... 
a anu bua ‘muanjelu mutambe bakuabu bunene,’ katu wakula bua ‘banjelu batambe bakuabu bunene’ to. Bidi bituleja ne: kutu anu muanjelu umuepele wa nunku. Anu Yezu ke udibu babikila nunku. Tshilejilu, 1 Tesalonike 4:16 udi wamba bua Yezu Kristo ne: ‘Mukalenge muine neapueke mu diulu wela dîyi dikole ne dîyi dia muanjelu mutambe bakuabu bunene.’ Badi bamba ne: Yezu udi ne dîyi dia muanjelu mutambe bakuabu bonso. Mvese eu udi uleja ne: Yezu ke Mikaele, mfumu wa banjelu.
Mfumu wa tshiluilu. Bible udi
... (439 chars skipped) ...
e ne ‘banjelu bende’ ne bua Yezu ne ‘banjelu bende.’ (Matayo 13:41; 16:27; 24:31; 1 Petelo 3:22) Bu mudi Bible kayi wakula bua biluilu bibidi bia banjelu ba lulamatu mu diulu (tshimue tshia Mikaele ne tshikuabu tshia Yezu), tudi tuamba ne: Mikaele n’Yezu padiye mu diulu.*
* Malu makuabu adi aleja ne: Mikaele n’Yezu adi mu mukanda wa Étude perspicace des Écritures, Volime 2, dibeji dia 280-281, ne mu wa Comment raisonner à partir des Écritures, dibeji dia 211-212, mipatula kudi Bantemu ba Yehowa.

Mfumu wa ditunga dia Congo Wa mungalata, wakenza luendu lua mudimu lua mêba makumi abidi ni inayi mu tshimenga tshia Oyo tshidi mu kilometre 400 ku Nord kua Brazzaville.Mulombodi wa ditunga Sassou N’guesso wakaya nkayende ku tshipalu tshia ndeke tshia Olombo bua kuakidila muena luendu wende munene Félix Tshisekedi.
Panyima pa dibanemeka dia basalayi ne dibenesha dia bena tshididi ba mu bisumbu bia mbulamatadi, balombodi babidi aba bakayukila minite mikese mu nzubu wa dilala wa mfumu wa ditunga, kumpala kua kusombabu mu mashinyi a muomumue bua kuyabu ku nzubu wa tshitupa tshîpi wa mfumu Tshisekedi.
Dikumbula dia mfumu wa ditunga mu Oyo didi mu tshitupa tshia dikolesha dia malanda a bulunda ne dienza mudimu pankatshi pa matunga abidi aa,
République démocratique du Congo ne République du Congo.
Mu Dia lumingu dia dia 14 ngondo muitanu, balombodi babidi aba bakayukila pa nkayabu, pashishe kuenzabu tshisangilu tshia mudimu ne bena mudimu babu.
Bakayukila bua malu adi atangila matunga abidi aa, buobumue bua matunga abidi aa ne malu a bukubi a ku est kua ditunga dia Congo.
Mulombodi Tshisekedi wakapingana mu Kinshasa mu Dia lumingu mu mapingaja
Shekinah Gloire kabongo

MULELA MU 1974
DITUNGA DIABU: MEXIQUE
TSHIVUAYE: NSONGA WA TSHIKISU NE MULUANGANYI WA MVITA MU NJILA
TSHIMVUA KALE:
Mvua muledibue mu Ciudad Mante, tshimenga tshimpe tshia mu provense wa Tamaulipas mu Mexique. Bantu ba bungi ba mu tshimenga etshi batu bapeshangana bintu ne batu ne bulenga. Kadi diakabi, mudi njiwu ya bungi bualu mudi bena tshikisu.
Kuetu tuvua bana ba balume banayi ne meme mvua muibidi. Baledi banyi bakantambuisha mu Katolike, ne pashishe ngakalua umue wa ku bimbi ba misambu. Mv
... (2204 chars skipped) ... 
pa kubijikija ne makofi anyi ne tshikisu.
Mêyi makuabu a mu Bible akangambuluisha adi mu Lomo 12:17-19, a ne: ‘Kanupingajidi muntu bubi ku bubi. Bikalaku mushindu, nuenze muenu muonso bua kuikala mu ditalala ne bantu bonso. Kanudisombuedi. Bualu mbafunde ne: “Yehowa udi wamba ne: ‘Disombuela ndianyi; meme nemfute.’”’ Ngakitaba ne: Yehowa neajikije tshikisu mu mushindu ne pa dîba didiye musue. Ku kakese ku kakese, ngakalekela tshikisu.
Tshiakupua muoyo bualu buakangenzekela dituku kampanda pamvua
... (2204 chars skipped) ...
akulu banyi ba balume babidi ne bakaji babu ne bana babu badi pabu mpindieu Bantemu ba Yehowa. Bamue ba ku balunda banyi ba kale batuvua tulonga nabu Bible badi pabu benzela Yehowa mudimu.
Diakabi, bamue bena mu dîku dietu bakadi bafue bualu kabavua balekele tshikisu to. Bu meme mutungunuke mu njila au, pamuapa mvua mua kuikala nkadi panyi mufue. Ndi ngela Yehowa tuasakidila bua kunkoka kudiye ne kudi batendeledi bende, badi bandongeshe ne lutulu ne bulenga bua kutumikila mêyi manene a mu Bible.

Andy Mbemba muena malu a tshididi wa mu ditunga dia Congo bua kusangisha ne kujula lungenyi lua bansonga ba mu ditunga dia Congo, udi wamba ne: kabiena bikengela kulombola bansonga, kuakula bua ditapuluka ne bua bisamba. Ndongoluelu mubi udi bena tshididi ba mu ditunga dia Congo benza nawu mudimu bua kudisankisha.
Pa bualu ebu , wakakula bimpe bua tshilumbu etshi ne wakaleja muvua tshikadilu etshi tshibi.
“Padi malu kaayi enda bimpe, bansonga ke badi baluangana mu njila. Nuambe ne: tòo ku tshikisu, nuambe ne: tòo ku dienza malu mabi, nuambe ne: tòo ku mêyi a ditapuluka ne a bisamba.
Nudiangate ne mudimu ne nuikale bena mudimu ba dishintuluka! Ke tshivua Andy Mbemba muambe.
Bu mudibu bamba ne: bansonga ke bantu ba matuku atshilualua, bidi ne mushinga bua bansonga bamanye mangema abu bualu matuku atshilualua a ditunga adi mu bianza biabu.
Shekinah Gloire kabongo

Mu ano masomo a kwifunda Bible ku bitupu, usa kutana’mo malondololo a bino bipangujo:
Le nkatana namani nsangaji mu būmi?
Le bintu bibi ne masusu bikapwa?
Le baswe bami bafwile nkebamona monka?
Le bine Leza untele mutyima?
Le nkalombela namani amba Leza angivwane?

Shi usaka, ukokeja kupata ku bitupu ano masomo onso, kubadila’mo ne kitabo Ikala Mūmi Nyeke! enka ne Bible mwine.
Bya Abe Mwine Kutonga
Ukokeja kwisamba na yewa ukufundija kitatyi kyo-kyonso ne kifuko kyo-kyonso—mpala na mpala, nansha kupityila ku bya busendwe.
Keaningilwangapo Muntu
Ubwanya kuleka ano masomo ponso posakila—kekudipo mutyipo.
Le ano masomo etu a Bible afundwanga namani?
Yewa ukufundija ukakukwasha uyuke byobya bifundija Bible, mungya mitwe ya myanda. Na ano masomo a kwifunda Bible a Ikala Mūmi Nyeke!, ukenda usokwela’ko bityebitye musapu udi mu Bible ne kumona moukukwashisha. Pa kuyukila’ko bivule, tala ino video, nansha kutala bipangujo bipangulwanga divule pa ano masomo.

YEHOWA wakasaka mupostolo Petelo ku diambuluisha dia nyuma bua kuleja dipetangana didi pankatshi pa kuikala wa tshijila didi mu mukanda wa Lewitiki ne kuikala ba tshijila mu bikadilu bietu bu mutudi bena Kristo. (Bala 1 Petelo 1:14-16.) Yehowa “Wa Tshijila” mmusue bua bela manyi ne “mikoko mikuabu
... (7069 chars skipped) ... 
 diende bua muana wa balume anyi bua muana wa bakaji ajika, nealue ne tshimpanga tshia mukoko tshidi mu tshidimu tshiatshi tshia kumpala bua mulambu wa kuosha ne muana wa nkudimba anyi kamanda nkutshi bua mulambu wa bubi kudi muakuidi, ku tshibuelelu tshia ntenta wa kusambakena.’ Nzambi uvua mulombe malu masunguluke, kadi dinanga diende divua dimuenekela mu mikenji ya Mose. Mamu yeye kayi ne mushindu wa kufila muana wa mukoko, bavua bamuanyishile bua kufila nyunyi ibidi ya kamanda nkutshi anyi b
... (7069 chars skipped) ...
aje mêsu anyi, bua meme kumona malu a kukema a mu mikenji yebe.’ (Mus. 119:18) Ikala utumikila mikenji ne mêyi manene bidi mu Bible. Ikala ne disanka bua kutumikila mukenji munene wa Yehowa “Wa Tshijila” ne enza “mudimu wa tshijila wa lumu luimpe lua Nzambi” ne tshisumi. (1 Pet. 1:15; Lomo 15:16) Leja muudi wa tshijila mu tshikondo tshikole tshia matuku a ku nshikidilu etshi. Tuetu bonso tuikale ba tshijila mu bikadilu bietu ne tutuayi bumfumu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wetu wa tshijila nyama ku mikolo.

« Muntu kakuikala ne muoyo anu bua bidia nkayabi, kadi bua mei onso adi alupuka munda mua Nzambi » (Lumu luimpe luakafundabu kudi Luka 4. 4).
Edi ndiandamuna dia Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto kudi Satana muteyanganyi, didi divuluija bena kuitabusha ne, kudisha kua muoyo wa buana bua Nzambi udi munda muabu, ne kudiunda kuabu kua mu nyuma, kudi kufuma ku dibala dilondangane ne dia ku dituku ku dituku dia Dî dia Nzambi.
Bua kukankamika ne kulombola dibala edi, dipungila dipiadipia, tshitupa tshibidi 
... (22805 chars skipped) ... 
anza dionso dituakadi mua kufuta, bua tuetu tuikale badishikamine, tumutumikila anu yeye. Kale, mupika wa bena Lomo, wakadi mua kupikudibua (mbuena kuamba ne kumupesha budikadidi), anyi mene muangata mushindu wa pa buawu, mu mu mulongo wa bupianyi bu muana kudi tatu wende (tshidibu babikila mu français ne adoption), muikale ne bukokeshi buonso bua bupianyi. Eu udi mundidimbi mukese wa mushindu wakenzela Nzambi bantu bonso babi, banyanguke, babipe ne bamutombokele ! Nzambi kakabepesha anu dilekel
... (22805 chars skipped) ...
1, 21), kakuyi mpata nansha mamuma a kulomba kuandi (shap. 9. 3 ; 10. 1). Bionso ebi bitambe kunyungisha kulomba kuetu bua bana betu badi kabayi banji kukudimuna mutshima !
Tshidi Nzambi utamba kuindila ku ditabusha dietu, nditumikila (mv. 19, 26 ndekelu), ne tshidi ditabusha dietu petu mua kuindila kudiye « kupitshila kudi Mukelenge Yezu Kilisto » tshidi Mbukole (mv. 25), lungenyi (mv. 27) ne ngasa (mv. 20, 24). Popamue ne mupostolo tumupeshe butumbi mu kumusakidila, nangananga mu dimusankisha.

Udi mukanda Mukole udi Paulo ufundila bena ekelesia ya mu Galatiya. Biakadi bikengela atangile, ke bualu bua bubi bua bukoya bua mubidi (mal moral) bu muakenzaye mu mukanda wende wakafundilaye bena Kolinto, kadi bua dilongesha dibi dia bubi bua ndekelu. Bena Galatia aba, bashimibue kudi bayishi ba mashimi, bakadi benda balekela ngasa, ngasa eu, udi mushindu umuepele wakupeta lupandu, baya bapingana mu ntendelelu wa bienzedi
... (7684 chars skipped) ... 
gowesha mayi). Eu ka mudimu wa mikeshi nansha. Mikeshi idi ne mudimu anu wa kuntuisha ku bubi ; idi bu ndeshi wa muana bua kunfikisha kudi Kilisto (mv. 24). Kunyima mudimu wandi udi ushika, bu mudi kabidi wa mulongeshi wakamana kulongoloa mulongi wandi bua kubanda mu kalasa kakuabu. Kalasa kakole bu mudi aka ka mikeshi ! Mikeshi idi indesha ne, meme ndi muntu mubi kadi kayena invuisha muntu muakane anyi imbingisha nansha, pandi mufue, kayena ne bukole bua kumpesha muoyo, meme mutekete, kayena im
... (7684 chars skipped) ...
udi mubadibue mufue ku malu a pa buloba ne bulobba bufue kudiye kabidi (mv. 14). Pa dib’adi malu a buloba kaatshiena ne bukokeshi kundi nansha kakese ne meme nthiena n’abo kudiu kabidi. Pankatshi panyi nau padi lupongo lunene, elu ke « mutshi mutshiamakane wa Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto », bupikudi buanyi ne butumbi buanyi. Ku luseke elu « tshifukibua tshipia tshipia » ku luseke lukuabu « kakui tshintu tshikuabu » tshia Nzambi kuanyisha (mv. 15). Tudi mua kufuanangana nandi mu menji ne nsombelu.

Wikale mudimuke mu malu ebe ne mu dilongesha diebe.—1 Tim. 4:16.
Timote ukavua uyisha munkatshi mua bidimu bia bungi. Timote uvua mumanye ne: bantu batu bashintuluka, ne nsombelu itu payi ishintuluka. Uvua musue bua bantu batungunuke ne kumuteleja, nunku uvua ne bua ‘kudimuka,’ ne uvua ne bua kutungunuka ne kuakaja ne kushintulula mushindu uvuaye ubalongesha. Lelu patudi tuyisha, tudi ne bua kuenza bia muomumue. Mu imue miaba, patudi tuyisha ku nzubu ne ku nzubu, tudi tumona ne: bantu ba bungi k
... (812 chars skipped) ... 
bena Kristo nabu. Ke mudibi kabidi lelu. Anji elabi meji muvua Alona ne Hû bakoleshe bianza bia Mose pavuabu bashale babikuate pavua bena Isalele baluangana ne bena Amaleka. (Ekes. 17:8-13) Lelu, tuetu petu tudi mua kukeba mishindu ya kukankamija bakuabu ne kubambuluisha. Bamue bana betu badi batatshishibua kudi bukulakaje, masama, buluishi bua kudi bena mu mêku abu, bunkaya anyi mbafuishe muntu kampanda uvuabu banange. Tudi kabidi mua kukolesha bansonga badibu basaka misangu yonso bua kuenza ma
... (812 chars skipped) ...
panda, kadi kabiyi bikumbane bua muaba mukuabu to. Nunku, nansha tuetu basombele muaba kayi, bu mutudi Bantemu ba Yehowa tudi ne bua kuepuka bua kulenduisha bakuabu ne mvuadilu wetu. Patudi tuya mu mpuilu ne mu mpungilu, mvuadilu wetu udi ne bua kuikala mukumbane ne wa nkatshinkatshi. Katuena ne bua kuidikija mishindu minekesha ya mvuadilu idi mitangalake mu bulongolodi ebu to. Netuikale ne disanka dia kudimanyisha bu Bantemu ba Yehowa, ne netuikale pabuipi bua kuyisha dîba dionso. w16.09 3:7, 8

MUSHINGA:
Filme idi ilenga mioyo ya bantu bualu badi bamona bimfuanyi ne bumvua mêyi. Idi ikoka ntema yabu ne badi bashala bayivuluka munda mua matuku a bungi. Yehowa mmushiye tshilejilu tshitambe buimpe tshia dienza mudimu ne bintu bidi bimueneka bua kulongesha.—Bz 10:9-16; Bua 1:1.
Filme wa Nzambi utu ne Dîna anyi?, wa Muena Bible nnganyi? ne wa Tshidi tshitujadikila ne: Bible udi ne malu malelela ntshinyi? nya kuela panudi mu dilongesha 2 ne 3 dia broshire wa Lumu luimpe. Filme wa Bua tshinyi kulonga Bible?, wa Mmushindu kayi utu dilonga dia Bible dienzeka? Ne wa Tshitu tshienzeka ku Nzubu wa Bukalenge ntshinyi? idi ikankamija bantu bua kulonga netu Bible ne kubuela mu bisangilu bietu. Tudi mua kuela kabidi filme yetu idi ne malu masunguluke adi apetangana ne malu atudi tulonga ne muntu.—km 5/13 3.
TSHIA KUENZA:
Dianjila kuambula filme uudi musue kuleja muntu uudi uyisha
Longolola lukonko lumue anyi ibidi yiwandamuna ne filme
Nutangile nende filme
Nuyukidilangane bua malu a mushinga adimu
TETABI KUENZA NUNKU:
Tangila panyima pa trakte yetu, uleje muntu kode wa kubuela nende mu Enternete bua kumona filme wa Bua tshinyi kulonga Bible?
Leja muntu filme wa Tshidi tshitujadikila ne: Bible udi ne malu malelela ntshinyi?, pashishe umupeshe broshire wa Lumu luimpe bua kukonkonona nende mu tshikoso dilongesha 3

Mushindu wa kabukulu bua kulama nzolu ne mubidi muimpe
Mayi a manyanu, muaaba wa manyanu, didia dibi ki kudi kufimina masama a bungi kudi nzolu, Sukula cikumbi ne umbusha dituku dionso ntumvi ne bia didia bia bishadile ; Ela mankenda mu mayi ne bukula bua curcuma anyi permanganatewa potassium, Kudisha nzolu mu bujalame ; Kumbaja ail ne ditungulu bua kukolesha mubidi wa Nzolu. Epusha nzolu ku dikuacisha dia mayi a bipapayi anyi misa ya betel ne pelure ya grenade Dimuka bua dipanga dia calcium pa dipesha nzolu musenga wa biseba bia mayi. Suika ka muci ne mabeji a dipembu mu cikumbi, mupuya wabu mukole udi unyemesha tuishi tubi

Nunku, diampa ne mvinyo mbimanyinu patupu. Diampa didi tshimanyinu tshia mubidi kauyi kalema wa Yezu. Kristo wakenza tshibilu etshi ne diampa dia ku a Pasaka avua mashale. Mampa au kabavua baela luevene anyi levire nansha mukese to. (Ekesode 12:8) Bible utu waku

KUNYOKA KUDI NE MUSHINGA
Wewe mulonde tshilejilu tshia Yehowa tshia kunyoka ne dinanga, ne nkatshinkatshi ne kuyi ushintuluka, neumone ne: mushindu uudi udienzeja newambuluishe bana bebe. Buludiki buudi ufila ne dinanga budi mua kuambuluisha bana bebe bua kuluabu bakulumpe ba meji, badi mua kudiambuila bujitu ne badi ne nkatshinkatshi. Anu mudi Bible wamba ne: ‘Yisha muana mu njila udiye ne bua kuendela; nunku pakolaye, kena umbukamu.’—Nsumuinu 22:6.

Yezu uvua wandamuna lukonko lua bapostolo bende luvua lutangila tshimanyinu tshia dikalaku diende ne nshikidilu wa ndongoluelu wa malu. Muikale ne bualu ebu mu lungenyi, udi ubapesha didimuija dimpe ku diambuluisha dia tshilejilu tshikuabu. Bantu bavua ne bua kuikala ne muoyo tshikondo tshia dikalaku diende bavua ne bua kumona dikumbana dia bualu ebu.
Udi utuadija tshilejilu wamba ne: “Bukalenge bua mu diulu budi mua kufuanyikijibua ne nsongakaji dikumi itshivua tumama ivua miangate miendu yayi,
... (1461 chars skipped) ... 
 19:11-15.

Patukayi bua kumuakidila.’” (Matayi 25:6) Ntshinyi tshivua tshifikile nsongakaji itshivua tumama bua didilongolola ne dikala badimuke?
Yezu udi utungunuka wamba ne: “Nunku nsongakaji yonso itshivua tumama ayi yakajuka, kulongololayi miendu yayi. Mitshimbakane yakambila ivua midimuke ne: ‘Tupeshayiku ndambu
... (1461 chars skipped) ...
 etshi?
Yezu uvua mutokeshe bimpe bualu ebu. Udi ujikija tshilejilu tshiende wamba ne: “Nanku nushale batabale, bualu kanuena bamanye dituku ne dîba.”—Matayi 25:13.
Bushuwa, Yezu uvua udimuija bayidi bende ba lulamatu ne: bua bidi bitangila dikalaku diende, bavua ne bua ‘kushala batabale.’ Pikalaye mua kulua, nebilombe bua bikale badilongolole ne badimuke, anu bu muvua nsongakaji itanu itshivua tumama midimuke, bua kabajimiji ditekemena diabu dia mushinga ne kupangila difutu didi dibalongoluela.

Bilondolola Bible
Mu Bible, mwine uyukene ne bu Bisonekwa Bijila, mudi binenwa bivule bya tunangu. Ino tala binena Bible pa mwawalongelwe amba: “Kisonekwa kyonso i kisonekejibwe na mushipiditu wa Leza.” (2 Temote 3:16) Kudi bukamoni buvule bubingija bino binenwa. Tala’tu bidi buno bulonda’ko:
I kutupu muntu ubwanya kulombola’mba Bible ke wa binepo mu mānga.
Balembi ba Bible bādi bantu bampikwa budimbidimbi bālembele pamikwa kufya kintu nansha kimo. Bilembwa byabo bya kubulwa kafinda bilombola’mba i wa bine.
Bible udi na mutwe wa mwanda mukatampe umo: kubingija lupusa lwa Leza lwa kubika bantu ne kufikidija mpango yandi kupityila ku Bulopwe bwandi bwa mūlu.
Nansha byaālembelwe pano ke padi tununu twa myaka, mu Bible kemudipo milangwe mitupe ya sianse yādi misambakane konsokonso pa kala.
Bukamoni bwa bilembwa bya pa kala bulombola’mba, bupolofeto nansha milao ya mu Bible, byafikidile.

Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

Tshisangilu tshia mulongo eu tshidi tshiakula bua malu adi atangila ditalala, bukubi ne dikokesha bimpe mu tshitupa etshi. Malu avuabu bayukila avua atangila nsombelu wa bukubi mu Est wa ditunga dia République démocratique du Congo (RDC) ne dienza dia mudimu wa SADC (SAMIDRC) mu Est wa ditunga edi.
Mu ditanu dipeta edi bamanyi ne balombodi ba malu a matunga a mu SADC bakadisangisha bua kulongolola tshisangilu etshi tshidi tshienzeka ngondo umue kumpala kua difuma dia tshiluilu tshia matunga a Afrike wa ku Est (EAC) tshidi mu ditunga dia RDC dia ku Est, dia mu dia 8 ngondo wa dikumi ne muibidi.
Pananku, Mu Disambombo edi, balombodi ba matunga a SADC bavua bakonkonona malu bu mudi: makuta adibu ne bua kufila, matunga adi ne bua kufila mapa ne dîba dienzabu mudimu wa SAMIDRC uvuabu bumvuangane bua kuenza mudimu ne mikenji ne biamu bia mudimu bia mu ngondo wa 7 wa tshidimu tshishale.
Tshisumbu tshinene tshia SADC ke tshidi tshiangata mapangadika manene mu bulongolodi ebu. Mudimu wende udi utangila malu a tshididi ne mushindu udi tshisumbu tshienza mudimu. Bipatshila bia SADC bivua ne bua kuikala bia kubandisha bubanji, kukepesha bupele ne kufila ditalala ne bukubi mu tshitupa atshi. Tshisumbu etshi tshidi ne matunga dikumi ni isambobo bua mu sud wa boloba bua Afrike mujima.
Shekinah gloire kabongo

Christian Bosembe wakaleja muvuaye ne buôwa bua bipeta bibi bia malu a ku Enternete adi bantu ba bungi benza mu ditunga dia Congo.

Ntshinyi tshidi bushuwa tshivuija dipa kampanda ne mushinga kuudi? Pamuapa mbua malu anayi aa: 1) muntu uvua mukupeshe dipa, 2) bua tshinyi uvua mukupeshadi, 3) tshivuaye mudipangishe bua kukupesha dipa adi, ne 4) ni divua dikumbaje dijinga diebe dinene. Kuelela malu aa meji kudi mua kutuambuluisha bua kukolesha dianyisha dietu bua tshia kupikula natshi bantu mmumue ne: dipa ditambe bunene dia Nzambi.

NTSHINYI TSHIVUAYE MUDIPANGISHE?
Amue mapa adi ne mushinga bualu adi aleja mudi muntu uvua mutupeshawu mudipangishe amue malu. Padi muntu witaba bua kutupesha tshintu tshidi ne mushinga wa bungi kudiye, tutu nangananga tuangata dipa adi ne mushinga bua malu adiye mudipangishe.

... (415 chars skipped) ... 
e la Bible, tuajiya guhana mukanda Itshi Biblia Yajiya Gutulongesa? tangua diagasue, nga ishigo wene tudi mukhaphela athu mu mbeji yene. Luholo lutshi tuajiya gukalegela ndaga jiagudisha jidi mu mukanda owu tangua tudi mulonguga Biblia nu muthu?
MU MBIMBI JIAZONDA: Athu avula ana gusuanguluga nu luholo tuana longuga Biblia nu athu, gutanga paragrafe enji gungima, guahula mihu. Uvi, gula muthu udi mulonguga nenji Biblia gashigo mujiya muabonga zuelelo nga gashigo mutanga muabonga, wajiya gukalege

ya ukuateshi muthu ana gulonguga nenji adi nawo funu. Gula mulongeshi udi mukalegela ndaga jidi mu mukhapho tangua adi mulonguga nu muthu, wajiya gukalegela gitshinyi mbimbi jiazonda gifua luholo lua guvutugila ndaga alonguga.
MALONGO A GISUGISHILO: Mbimbi nu ndaga jidi muzuelewa mu gitshinyi egi jiasonegewa mu luholo jidi mumonega mu mikhapho. Tangua adi mulonguga nu muthu, mulongeshi wajiya gutomba gukalegela nga ndo gitshinyi malongo a gisugishilo, gia mukanda Itshi Biblia Yajiya Gutulongesa?

UKANDU WI BUWA WA KIPANDJILO WUBELUA BUA MUNTU OSO MBUNGILO A MUANDA
Kui bintu bisatu bikume bantu.
- Miluisho (bikitshino bitshibilue kiimu),
- Muluisho (= nsulo ya bubi, nsulo ya mikitshino yposo i bubi),
- Makienga aamueka na meso kuatudi.
+ Muanda wa kumpala ngupue kupeta lualulo ku lufu lua Yesu ku muanda wetu.
+ Muanda wa kabidi,ngupete kipeta ku lufu luetu na Nkidishitu.
+ Muanda wa kasatu awukapete lualulo apafiki Yesu.
Anka mu mianda yaya yoso tuibalombene kuiyitula kui Nkidishitu Yesu.

Bana betu ba bajila Kasanga,
Nanga nanga mu diku kia muana wa kumpala wa Kasanga, mbuena kuamba "Muanza Mande Kanyoka", anyi bakua Kanyoka ni Mfumu wabu wa ka bukulu Nsabanga, nansha kumutu kuende kuikale Mfumu Nsapu (bualu yeyi biende udi mu diku dia bakua Kanyoka), ni bena Beene, mmumue ni ndelanganyi ya Ndambala Beene, umue wa ku bana ba Muanza Mande Kanyoka, ni bena kabesa, nyinkende wa Mwange, ni Kându, ni Nsase, ni Ilunga (bakwa Ilunga mua Lubuelu), nungambileku, bua badi bamanye, bakulu ni bakunyi ba Muange Luamana. bandi même mumanye badi : Muange Luamana, wa ba Nsase, ni Kându Nkuba, ni Ilunga.
Udiku mumanye bana babu bakuabu atufundile ni mudibu balondangane. Tuasakidila wa mansa tente.

Bua tshinyi kusambila bua Bukalenge bua Nzambi bulue?
Bukalenge bua Nzambi mbulamatadi wa mu diulu. Yezu wakambila bayidi bende bua kusambila bua dilua dia Bukalenge ebu bualu nebufile buakane ne ditalala pa buloba. Kakuena mbulamatadi wa bana ba bantu udi mua kujikija kashidi tshikisu, kansungansunga anyi masama, kadi Bukalenge bua Nzambi bobu nebujikije malu aa. Nzambi mmusungule Muanende Yezu bua kuikalaye Mukalenge wa Bukalenge ebu. Yehowa mmusungule kabidi tshisumbu tshia bayidi ba Yezu bua kukokesha pamue ne Yezu mu Bukalenge.—Bala Luka 11:2; 22:28-30.
Mu katupa kîpi emu, Bukalenge bua Nzambi nebubutule bantu bonso badi baluisha bukokeshi bua Nzambi. Nunku, kusambila bua Bukalenge bua Nzambi bulue nkulomba bua mbulamatadi wa Nzambi apingane pa muaba wa mbulamatadi yonso ya bantu.—Bala Danyele 7:13, 14; Buakabuluibua 11:15, 18.
Ntshinyi tshidi tshileja ne: Bukalenge bua Nzambi nebuambuluishe bantu?
Yezu Mmukalenge muimpe bualu udi uditeka pa muaba wa bantu. Bu mudiye muana wa Nzambi, udi kabidi ne bukole bua kuambuluisha bantu bonso badi balomba Nzambi diambuluisha.—Bala Musambu 72:8, 12-14.
Bukalenge bua Nzambi nebuambuluishe bantu bonso badi basambila ne2 muoyo mujima bua bulue ne badi benza malu mu diumvuangana ne disua dia Nzambi. Kuakunyingalala nansha kakese bua kumanya tshidi Bible wamba bua Bukalenge bua Nzambi.—Bala Luka 18:16, 17; Yone 4:23.

Tableau 7 : Ka tshitimauenitakuak assi
Mekuat e nataut, ekue mitshimuashkushimat anite mishtikut uakashkua. Pessish etat, ekue putatat nenua minaikua. Aiat ekue nitautshiniti.
Ekue anu akushit tshetshi natuapamat nenua uakashkua. Ekue akushipanit nuash nete tshishikau-pishimuaetaniti. Ekue utitat nenua pishimua, anite eshpish tat ui uapameu nenua tipishkau-pishimua. Muku tatuau nenua pemuteniti iapit nutekushu, tatuau ua uapamati tipishkau-pishimua. Muku ne tipishkau-pishimu katshi pimuteti, patush Tshakapesh ekue apishikushit.
Apu tshekuannu tshi aitutuat, apu tshi peshuapamat. Ekue nitapakushit Tshakapesh.

... (1053 chars skipped) ... 
a eu kumufuta dibanza adi to. Nunku mukalenge wakatuma dîyi bua bapane mupika au ne mukajende ne bana bende bua kufuta dibanza adi. Ke mupika kudiela panshi ku makasa a mfumuende ne kumusengelelaye ne: “Ikalaku nanyi lutulu, nenkufute bintu biebe bionso.”—Matayi 18:26.
Mukalenge wakumvua luse ne kulekeelaye mupika eu dibanza dinene adi. Diakamue pakenza mukalenge nanku, mupika eu wakapatuka ne kupetanganaye ne mupika nende mukuabu uvua ne dibanza diende dia ndenaliyo 100. Wakakuata mupika mukuab

 mmutulekeele dibanza dinene dia mpekatu. Nansha muena Kristo netu yeye mutuenzele bubi kayi nebuikale anu bukese patudi tubufuanyikija ne mpekatu itutu tuenza. Yehowa ki mmutubuikidile anu musangu umue kadi misangu binunu ne binunu. Katuenaku petu mua kufuila bena Kristo netu luse misangu ya bungi nansha tuetu bikale ne bualu bua kudiabakena anyi? Mfumu wa ditunga Félix Tshisekedi udi mufike mu Lubumbashi, tshimenga tshia Haut Katanga, mu dilolo dia makelela wa mercredi dituku dia dikumi ne makumi muanda mutekete mufume mu Afrique du Sud, muakadiye mubuele mu tshibilu tshia dibika dia mulunda wende Cyril Ramaphosa.
Mu dinda dia lumingu elu, Mfumu wa ditunga udi ulombola dibanjijibua dia mashinyi a mudimu wa ditunga. Tuasa tua mashinyi aa tudi tukumbaja dijinga dinene didi nadi Kasumbu ka malu a budimi bua kutuma bintu biabu bia budimi mu miaba minene ya diambuluishangana ya mu ditunga dia République démocratique du Congo (RDC).
Bana betu ba balume ba mu tshisumbu tshia bibaki bavuabu babikila ne: bena tshibawu, ke badi bakuna bintu ebi. Ne Dipangadika dia mbulamatadi dia 15 ngondo wa dikumi wa tshidimu tshia 1997 (Décret-loi 032 wa dia 15 ngondo wa dikumi wa tshidimu tshia 1997) diakenza bua kuenza mudimu wa busalayi eu.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

Bamue badi bamba ne: dibanza dia mbulamatadi didi dienda divula.

.
Tudi bashintulule malu a mbulamatadi wetu wa makuta ne wa pankatshi. Ke bualu kayi lelu eu malu adi enda bimpe mu tshisalu.
Mu mishindu ya bungi, tudi mu nsombelu udi kawuyi ne nshindamenu, nunku mbia pa tshibidilu bua bungi bua makuta kubanda anyi kukepesha.
Tudi anu ne bua kuepuka bua dishintuluka kadiyi dipita pa 5%. Bua kukepesha didikuangana dia makuta mu ndongoluelu wa malu a mpetu, bidi bikengela kupatula dolare, kupatula ne kudia makuta a mu ditunga dia Congo.

RÉVEILLEZ-VOUS !
Lukonko: Bible mmukanda wa kudi Nzambi anyi? Peshi mmuule tente anu ne meji a bantu?
Mvese: 2Tm 3:16
Difila: Réveillez-vous ! eu udi ne bijadiki bisatu bidi bileja ne: Bible udi bushuwa mukanda wa kudi Nzambi.
LONGESHA BULELELA
Lukonko: Tudi ne bua kumona dipa dia muoyo mushindu kayi?
Mvese: Bua 4:11
Bulelela: Tudi tunemeka muoyo bualu ndipa dia kudi Nzambi. Tudi tudimukila njiwu ne katuena ne bua kushipa muoyo wa muntu mukuabu ku bukole nansha kakese. Tudi tuangata dipa dia muoyo ne mushinga.
TSHIDI MUA KUFILA DISANKA MU DÎKU NTSHINYI?
Lukonko: Tangila lukonko ludi pa mutu pa trakte eu ne amue mandamuna adibu bafile. Wewe udi mua kuandamuna bishi?
Mvese: Luk 11:28
Difila: Trakte eu udi uleja mudi bualu budi mu mvese eu mua kuambuluisha dîku diebe ne bua tshinyi tudi ne bua kuitaba tshidi Bible wamba.
FUNDA TSHIEBE TSHIA KUAMBA
Idikija mishindu ya bia kuamba idi kuulu eku bua kukeba tshiebe tshia kuamba mu buambi.

Teja Leza Amba Wikale Mūmi Nyeke
Leza udi pamo bwa mbutwile wa buswe. 1 Petelo 5:6, 7
Leza i Umpangi wetu, kadi witutele mutyima. Leza ufundijanga bantu bandi konsokonso muswelo muyampe wa mwa kwikadila mu būmi, pamo bwa mbutwile wa tunangu ne buswe ufundija bandi bana.
Leza witusokwelanga bubinebine bulēme bwituletela nsangaji ne lukulupilo.
Shi uteje Leza, nandi ukakuludika, kukulama, ne kukukwasha unekenye makambakano.
Ino kadi—ukekala na būmi bwa nyeke!
Leza witunena’mba ‘iyai kondi, ivwanai amba mwikale bōmi.’ Isaya 55:3

Christoph Colomb, mulela mu tshinunu nkama inayi makumi atanu ne umwa ku Gêne ne mufwe mu tshinunu nkama itanu ne isambombo,uvwa mwikala mwendi wa pa mayi ku butumibwe bwa bamfumu ba kabeya ngonga,Isabelle de Castille ne Ferdinad d’Arago. Uvwa mujandula Amerike mu ngondo lumungulu tshinunu nkama inayi makumi tshitemba ne ibidi .Pasishe kutungunuka ne midimu yende mu Portugal biangatshile tshinunu nkama inayi makumi abidi ku muelelu kwa Afrika ne lungenyi lwa kufika toone ku ditunga dia Inde,biangatshile maayi aa Océan indien.

Bakokeshi ba mu ditunga dia Congo bakanyishila Moïse Katumbi mulombodi wa tshisumbu tshia tshididi tshia Ensemble pour la République bua kubuela mu provense wa Kongo Central mu Dibidi dia 23 ngondo muitanu, bualu ebu buakebesha malu a bungi.
Tudi tumona ne: bantu ba mu ditunga dia Congo bavua badiebeja bua bualu ebu patuvua tufika muaba au. Muntu eu udi udiebeja katshia ku tshikondo kayi tshidibu balomba muntu wa mu ditunga dia Congo dianyisha bua kuenda mu ditunga dia République démocratique du Congo?
Muntu mukuabu udi kayi muanji kumanyisha dîna diende udi utuambila ne: “Katuena banji kumona bualu ebu to, bualu ebu budi ne malu a tshididi, bualu muntu nansha umue wa mu ditunga dia Congo kena ukeba dianyisha dia kuya mu provense nansha umue to”. “Mu katupa kîpi emu, nebatuenzeje bua kusumba mikanda ya dienza nayi ngendu bua tuende mu ditunga dietu. Katuena tumvua kabidi bualu nansha bumue to, mmunyi mutudi mua kukandika muena Kongo bua kuya muaba udiye musue mu ditunga diende? “.
Tshikondo atshi, bampulushi bavua bimanyine ku tshiibi tshia tshimenga tshia Mitendi, ku tshiibi tshia ditunga dia Kongo Central. Ndekelu wa bionso, bua kupangisha ngovena wa kale wa Katanga bua kunyanga buloba bua Simon wa ku Kimbangu.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

Pamvua mu Afrique du Sud, ngakapeta diakalenga ne disanka dia kuyukila ne mukalenge mukaji Zenani Mandela. Uvua mukaji wa bukole, wa dikema, uvua ne tshisumi ne bukole.
Tuvua tuyukila bua dipetangana dia dimanya pankatshi pa Winnie Mandela Foundation ne Denise Nyakeru Tshisekedi Fondation. Tudi tukonkonona bua kuenza mudimu pamue pankatshi pa bibambalu bietu bibidi mu matuku adi alua.
Ngakalonga malu a bungi mimpe a mu nsombelu wa baledi bende, bu mudi ntatu ivua bena mu dîku diabu bapete pavuabu bakuate Madiba ne mudimu munene uvua Winnie Mandela muenze mu mvita bua budikadidi bua ditunga dia muonji wa mvula.
Tudi ne bua kunemeka bakaji babidi aba.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

Mulombodi wa ditunga udi utabalela bikole mushindu wa kuakaja iniversite ne tulasa tua bungi.
Bua kumanya amue malu adi enzeka mu mudimu eu, ministre wa malu a diumvuangana ne bikandakanda ne mulunda wende wa mu ESU bakenza luendu mu Dimue dia 3 ngondo muinayi wa 2023.
Luendu elu luakatuadija mu tulasa tua mu Iniversite wa Kinshasa.
Bena mbulamatadi babidi aba bakenza muyuki ne bamanyishi.
Ngakaya kutangila iniversite ibidi eyi ivuabu balongolola bua kuibaka nzubu ya balongi.
“Pa kumbusha progra
... (636 chars skipped) ... 
isha bamanyishi ba bikandakanda bua kumona mushindu udi mudimu wa diambuluishangana dia nzubu ya balongi ku UPN wenda.
Bakalongolola biamu, nzembu, tshibuelelu tshia kapepe ne mâyi mu nzubu ya balongi batue ku 6000.
Badi benza mudimu wa muomumue ku Unikin bua kupeta balongi batue ku 4000. Mu muaba eu udibu basungule bua manaya a muakulu wa tshiena France, badi benza midimu ya kulongolola njila idi yenda yenzeka.
Mbulamatadi mmusue bua mudimu eu wikale mu bimenga bikuabu bia ditunga bua kuleja ne
... (636 chars skipped) ...
 mudimu eu neujike mu dia matuku makumi abidi ni muanda mukulu ngondo muinayi bikala makuta onso mapete.
Tudi mua kuvuluka ne: mudimu wa ku Unikin uvua wa kuakaja biamu bia mâyi, kuakaja nzembu, kuakaja mâyi, kuakaja njila ne kuibaka nsubu bua kulama muaba wa kalasa, ke muvua mulombodi munene wa kumpanyi uvua wenza mudimu au muambe.
Mulombodi wa ESU, Mohindo Nzangi wakamba ne: mpindieu balume ba balongi nebadifidile makuta a bungi bua kulama bintu bia mushinga mukole ebi.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

Madisuisha a dikeba bu mfumu bua ditunga: Ku Bukavu, Katumbi walayi ni neatshimune bisumbu bionso bia ba ntomboji nangananga ba M23
Mu tshimenga tshia Bukavu, tshimenga tshikuku tshia province wa Sud - Kivu, katumbi muimana kumpala kua musumba wa bantu mu dimue dia matuku 27, ngondo eu wa 11, wambi bua se bena ku luseka eku bua se bobo bamusungula bukubi kubi nebuikale yenda mvita minene bua kubueja bupole.
Katumbi walayi se, padiyi amu ulue mfumu wa ditunga, udi ujikija bimvundu bionso bidi ba 
... (16 chars skipped) ... 
batuela. Nangananga mu ma Kivu ni mu Ituri. Ne atuta bantomboji bonso ne kubashibeya kabidi, bakuabu mu maloku.
Kakufuila ba M23 lusa to. Nansha mudi Rwanda muikala ubatua nyama ku mikolu. Wambi ne yeya ka kuikala mfumu mulalakanyi bua wenda udilakana tshianana tshianana kumpala kua bantu kayi ukuba ni ukeba menji a dikuba bantu nansha.
" Ndi ni tshia bua kujikija mvita yonso mu ditunga dijima, mu ma province onso adi ni ndululu, bu mudi Kivu yonso mujima ni mikuabu. Mfumu wa ditunga kena mua ku
... (16 chars skipped) ...
ga wa didilakana to. Tudi tujikijangana ni ba ntomboji bonso kakuyi lusa nansha. Netupesha biluilu bia ditunga dietu bionso bidibu bakengela bua kuluanganabu kakuyi bilela to", ki muambi Katumbi nanku.
Mu diakula dienda Katumbi waleji kabidi se, Félix Tshilombo ke udi mulua ni ba M23 aba bua bikala baluisha ditunga dietu, mu miyiki ivuayi muenza nabu ku Tshinsansa.
Katumbi uvu mufika ku Bukavu mu diumbuka dienda ku Idjwi, mu province wa Sud Kivu, muvuyi kabidi muakula ne bena kuina ku musoku eu.

Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto : Dipingana diende
Kilisto wakakumbaja mudimu ku mutshi mutshiamakane (shap. 2). Mubande mu diulu, udi ukuata mudimua bua bualu buetu katataka mu midimu yonso idiye nayi (shap. 3) Ne matuku adi alua kumpala, neapingane kabidi. Dipingana edi nedienzeke mu bitupa bibidi : - diangata dia Ekelezia ne dimueneka diandi mu butumbi.
Nkonko ne mandamuna bidi bilonda kuinshi eku, bidi ne kipatshila ka kuleja tshikondo kayi tshikala malu aa abidi mua kumueneka, ne bimanyishilu kayi b
... (5131 chars skipped) ... 
kale ne ntatu ei, idi ishilangana ne "dikenga dikole".
Mufundu wa mu 2 Tesalonike 1. 4 ne 2. 3, udi unvuija ne dikenga dia bena Tesalonike didi dishilangana ne "digenga dinene" didi dilamakaja ku "dituku dia Mukelenge" (2. 2) tangila lukonko lua 4. 9.
4.9 Tshiakuidi "Dituku dia Mukelenge" tshidi tshiunvuija tshinyi?
"Dituku dia Mukelenge" tshidi tshiakuidi tshiangata bua kunvuija tshitupa tshia tshikondo (ke dituku dia meba 24h to). Tshikondo atshi, tshidi tshibanga anu kunyima kua diambudibua d
... (5131 chars skipped) ...
eta bionso bia mudimu wa Kilisto mua kumueneka (Filip. 1. 6, 10; 4. 1) nebadisangishe pabu ku ditumbisha ne ku dikema biangata kilisto (2 Tesal. 1. 10). Ku lunga luseke, ne bidi ne mushinga wa bungi, ndituku, didi Mukelenge wabu - Yeye wakalondabu pakadiye mubengibue pa buloba - umanyibua ne utumbishibua kudi buonso. Luseke lukuabu kabidi, nedikale dituku dia difutu (2 Tim. 4. 8).
Dituku dia dimueneke dia "Mukelenge wa bakelenge" DIDI ne tshia kuikala dituku dia disanka kudi mukaji wandi musela.

TSHIBUMBA TSHIA NSENTEDI No 2 2017 | Newitabe dipa ditambe bunene dia Nzambi anyi?
UDI WELA MEJI KAYI?
Ndipa kayi ditambe bunene dia katshia ne katshia didi Nzambi mutupeshe?
Bible udi wamba ne: ‘Nzambi mmunange ba pa buloba bikole menemene, wakabapesha Muanende mulela umuepele.’—Yone 3:16.
Tshibumba tshia Nsentedi etshi tshidi tshileja bua tshinyi Nzambi wakatuma Yezu pa buloba bua kutufuila ne mutudi mua kuleja dianyisha dietu bua dipa edi.
COVER SUBJECT
Bible udi umvuija tshidi dipa didi ne mushinga kawuyi kuamba, didi mua kupetesha bantu badi badita muoyo wa tshiendelele. Kuvuaku mua kuikala dipa dikuabu dia mushinga wa bungi anyi?
COVER SUBJECT
Mmalu kayi adi avuija dipa kampanda ne mushinga wa bungi kupita makuabu? Kutabalela malu aa kudi mua kukuambuluisha bua kukolesha dianyisha dietu bua tshia kupikula natshi bantu.
Bible udi wamba ne: “matuku a ku nshikidilu” avua ne bua kuikala “bikondo bikole bibi bidi bikole mua kupita nabi.” Tshidibu bambe etshi, tshidiku tshipetangana ne tshikondo tshitudi lelu eu anyi?

MUNKATSHI mua butuku, muana udi utuadija kudila. Mamuende udi ujuka diakamue. Katshia muanende eu waledibua, katshiena ulala tulu bimpe bu pa tshibidilu to. Mmulonge mua kusunguluja miadi ya muanende. Nunku udi mua kumanya dîba didi muana musue kuamua, didiye musue bamuambule anyi didiye udila bua bualu bukuabu. LONGESHA BULELELA
Lukonko: Udiku witaba pebe ne: mulayi wa buprofete wa mu Bible eu udi wakula bua malu adi enzeka lelu eu anyi?
Mvese: 2Tm 3:1-5
Bulelela: Bu mudi mulayi udi wakula bua matuku a ku nshikidilu eu wenda ukumbana lelu, tudi batuishibue ne: mulayi wa buprofete udi wakula bua nsombelu mulenga mu matuku atshilualua neukumbane.
BUA TSHINYI KULONGA BIBLE? (Filme)
Mua kutuadija: Tudi tuenda tuleja bantu filme udi umvuija mu tshikoso muaba utudi mua kupetela mandamuna mimpe a nkonko minene itutu tudiela. [Ela filme.]
Difila: Mukanda eu udi uleja tshidi Bible wamba bua muikala Nzambi mua kulongolola malu pa buloba apa. [Pesha muntu mukanda wa Bible ulongesha.]

Idikija mishindu ya bia kuamba idi kuulu eku bua kukeba tshiebe tshia kuamba mu buambi.

‘Wewe Yehowa udi mufumbi; buonso buetu tudi bintu biwakuenza ku bianza biebe.’—YESHAYA 64:8.

1. Bua tshinyi Yehowa m’Mufumbi mutambe bunene?
MU NGONDO wa 11 mu 2010, kuvua tshivuadi tshia dîma tshia mu Chine mu Angleterre, ne bavua batshiele mushinga wa ndola mitue ku miliyo 70. Bidi bikemesha bua kumona ne: mufumbi udi mua kuenza tshivuadi tshimpe tshia makuta a bungi ne dîma dietu dia tshianana edi didi ne mushinga mukese. Yehowa, Mufumbi wetu, mmupite kule ne kule mufumbi kayi
... (6116 chars skipped) ... 
bupiabupia, netupete masanka onso adi afumina mu mparadizu wa mu nyuma. Netuikale kabidi ne disanka bua nsombelu utuikale nende mu mparadizu muena dîna wakokeshabu kudi Bukalenge bua Nzambi. Tshikondo atshi, Yehowa neatungunuke ne kutufumba ne kutulongesha mu mushindu wa dikema utudi katuyi mua kuelela meji mpindieu. (Yeshaya 11:9) Yehowa neavuije kabidi meji etu ne mibidi yetu mipuangane. Nebikale bipepele menemene bua tuetu kumvua mêyi ende onso ne kuatumikila. Nunku, tutungunukayi ne kulekela
... (6116 chars skipped) ...
, ne udi utangila ne ntema yonso bua kumona tshituenza. (Bala Musambu wa 32:8.) Udiku umona ne: Yehowa udi ukutabalela anyi? Udiku umona mudi Yehowa ukufumba bimpe bimpe anyi? Biobi nanku, nngikadilu kayi yakuambuluisha bua kuikala bu dîma dinefuke didi Yehowa mua kufumba? Nngikadilu kayi iudi mua kuepuka bua kubenga kulua bu dîma dipape didibu kabayi mua kufumba? Mmunyi mudi baledi mua kuenza mudimu pamue ne Yehowa bua kufumba bana babu? Tshiena-bualu tshidi tshilonda netshiandamune nkonko eyi.

Udi mpindieu ubadimuija bua kubenga kulonda “ba-Kristo ba dishima ne baprofete ba dishima.” Wakamba ne: nebatete “bua kupambuisha, kuoku mushindu, too ne basungula.” (Matayi 24:24) Kadi kabakupambuisha basungula aba to. Kadi Yezu kena usua kuamba ne: tshisumbu kampanda tshia bayidi bende netshipete meji mabi to. Ndilongesha kayi divua Yezu ujinga bua bayidi bende bumvue bimpe? Uvua musue bua bashale batabale ne benze mudimu anu muvuaye mubatokeshele mu tshilejilu tshikuabu.

Kupinganyina bantu ne lukasa kudi kuleja mutudi bushuwa tuditatshisha bua bantu badi basue kumvua Bible
Bidi bikengela kudienzeja bikole bua kupinganyina bantu ne kulonga nabu Bible. Kadi masanka atuapeta mmapite kule ne kule bionso bitudi tuditatshisha bua kuenza. Patudi tudifila bua kuyisha, tudi tuambuluisha bakuabu bua “bafike ku dimanya dijalame dia bulelela,” bua bobu kusungidibua. (1 Tim. 2:3, 4) Buetu tuetu, bidi bitupetesha disanka kadiyi kuamba.

Mmumue ne: muntu udi ulonda mikenji ya bikadilu bimpe dituku dionso bua kumanyisha bena mu Congo ne bantu ba pa buloba bujima. “Ku lukonko lua UNPC lua mushindu udi bansangu mua kuambuluisha bua kuikala bimpe mu bikandakanda ne bua kulengeja nsombelu wa bansangu mu ditunga dia Congo, Mfumu wa ditunga udi ulomba bua kuleja mudi mbulamatadi mulamate tshipatshila etshi mu mpungilu”, ke mudi ministre Muyaya muambe.

Mills TSHIBANGU, mumanyishi munene wa malu a makebulula mu ditunga dia Congo, wakaya mu biro bia Conseil Supérieur de l’Audiovisuel (CSAC) mu dia 19 ngondo wa 7 wa 2024 bua kuandamuna ku dibikila dia kudibu bua malu adibu bamubanda nawu bua dipanga dia lumu lua Mukebuludi munene wa malu a mpetu.
Kadi pakafikaye, kakuvua muntu nansha umue wa ku bantu bavua bamubikile uvua mushale bua kumuteleja to. Mills TSHIBANGU wakakula bua muyuki wende wa ndekelu mu tshikandakanda tshia Kinoise, muvuaye muakule bua Mulombodi wa mudimu, Mukebuludi munene wa malu a mpetu, kadi ki ng’Mukebuludi munene wa malu a mpetu to, bualu ebu ke buvua bufikishe ku dibanda edi.
TSHIBANGU udi ulomba bena mu Kinshasa, nangananga bamamu ne balume, bua balue kumulonda kumpala kua balumbuluishi bua kutshimuna mvita eyi. Pashishe wakambila kabidi Mukebuludi munene wa malu a mpetu bua kuyabu nende ku tubadi bua kujadika ne: kavua ne bualu.
Mills TSHIBANGU wakalomba diambuluisha kudi Mukokeshi wa ditunga bua kuambula makuta adibu bakuate kudi bimue bisumbu pamue ne tshibambalu tshia malu a mpetu (Inspection Générale des Finances).udi ulaya ne: mu matuku adi alua, nebakule bikole bua bualu ebu.
Shekinah gloire Kabongo

Rose Mutombo, ministre wa malu a mbulamatadi ne wa malu a buakane, wakakula bua mukanda udi ne malu a bungi adibu benza bua kutela amue malu mabi adibu benza mu mvita.
‘Mukanda wa Tshivulukilu udi bu mukanda wa malu adibu balomba bantu bua kuenza. Bushuwa tudi tuenza malu a bungi. Tudi ne malu a diyukidilangana, a bilumbu, kadi tudi kabidi ne mudimu wa kuakuila bantu batudi ne bua kuakuila. Bualu tudi ne bua kumanyisha mukenji eu kudi bantu bonso. Mu mukanda eu, badi bakeba bua kutela amue malu mabi adibu benza mu mvita. Ke bualu kayi mu tshikondo tshiakanyine netupete bijadiki bidi mua kutuambuluisha bua kujikija bilumbu bishilashilangane bidibu batuele mu tubadi tushilashilangane,’ ke mudiye muambe.
Rose Mutombo wakabikidisha bena mu ditunga dia Congo bua kuakula bua mukanda eu bua kufila dîyi dia mukanda eu.
Shekinah gloire kabongo

Mena monekela mianda ya dikobolola ne mwakwidi wa bukalenga bwa Kongu, Patrick Muyaya ne Kavulambedi tshindonda momekela mianda ya maloba amiaba idi bantu Basangidibwa, Eve Bazaïba bavwa bikala bakwila ngandamwinu mipeta mu sangilu wa ba mena wa makumi mwanda muteketa ne muteketa (77 ème) pa bipeta bia disanganyibwa dia ditunga dia Kongu wa mungalata mmusangilu wa COP 27.

Musangishibwa ne bulombondi bwakane mu tshidi tshitangila mwanda wa kupuyakana kwimpa kwa buloba, kwa Mfumu wa ditunga, Eve Bazaïba wakwela kashonyi ba kipatshila ka Kongu wa mungalata, ditunga di
... (1389 chars skipped) ...
dika dia mutunga avwa matwilangana mwa kupwekesha mudilu wa buloba bujima mu dekele umwa ne tusunsa tutanu mu tshidimu thsa binunu bibidi ne makumi asatu. Mianda ya mpetu, manema ne dituma dishemesha, avwa makudibwa mmusangilu wa COP 27.
Mudioya ngombu, Eve Bazaïba wakumanyisha bwase Kongu wa mungalata, mudimwenesha mutshidi tshitangila mwanda ya tshididi ne bulami bwa miaba misangidibwa kudi bantu ne bintu, Kavulambedi tshindonda wajadi se badi mpindiewu bapole mpetu bwakukumbaja majinga.

Petelo ne Yone bakadi bamane kufika mu Yulushalema bua kulongolola Pasaka anu muvua Yezu mubambile. Pashishe Yezu ne bapostolo bende bakuabu dikumi badi basa luendu batangile pabu ku Yelushalema. Tudi mu mapingaja ne dîba didi dienda dibuela ku ouest padi Yezu ne bayidi bende bapueka pa Mukuna wa Olive. Eu mmusangu wa ndekelu udi Y
... (1251 chars skipped) ... 
natshi mâyi. Pashishe udi wela mâyi mu dilongo didi pabuipi nende. Pa tshibidilu, muntu uvua wakidila benyi ke uvua ne bua kuenza bua boweshe benyi mâyi ku makasa pamuapa kudi muena mudimu. (Luka 7:44) Kadi mu tshibilu etshi kamuvua muntu uvua wakidilangana to, ke bua tshinyi Yezu wakenza nkayende mudimu eu. Mupostolo yonso uvua ne mpunga wa kuenza mudimu eu, kadi nansha umue wa kudibu kavua muenze nanku to. Kabavua benze nanku bualu kutshivua makokangana munkatshi muabu anyi? Nansha biobi nanku
... (1251 chars skipped) ...
nene kupita uvua mumutume to. Nuenu bamanye malu aa, nudi ba diakalenga binuaenza.”—Yone 13:12-17.
Edi divua dilongesha dimpe dia kuenza mudimu mupuekele! Bayidi ba Yezu kabavua ne bua kukeba miaba ya kumpala, bela meji ne: badi ne mushinga wa bungi ne badi ne bua kubenzela bobu mudimu to. Kadi badi ne bua kulonda tshilejilu tshia Yezu, kabiyi bua kulonda mikiya ya dioweshangana mâyi ku makasa to, kadi badi ne bua kuikala pabuipi bua kuenzelangana mudimu ne budipuekeshi kabayi ne kansungansunga.

« Muntu kakuikala ne muoyo anu bua bidia nkayabi, kadi bua mei onso adi alupuka munda mua Nzambi » (Lumu luimpe luakafundabu kudi Luka 4. 4).

16. Mmuenenu wa ku mesu : formes extérieures
Yesu udi mu luendu mutangile ku musoko wa Tulo ne Sidona. Bimenga ebi bia bantu badi kabayi bitabuje, Mukelenge wakamana kuakula bualu buabi ne, dipila diabu diakadi dikese, kutamba dia mu
... (46216 chars skipped) ...
kole, bu mudiwu disua dia ndekelu kudi udi ubapeshau. Bukokeshi buonso bua Bukelenge bua kabenga bantu bandi kumupesha, Nzambi wakumupabu mu diulu ne pa buloba ne bayidi bandi badi ne bujitu bua kubumanyisha. Kadi Yesu udi upesha kabidi bantu bandi mulayi, kakapanga ne kena upanga kuikala ne bapikudibue bandi dituku nansha dimue, « ndi nenu matuku onso » too ne kunshikidilu kua bikondo. Mushindu eu ke udiye ujikija lumu luimpe bu muakabangaye ne dina dia Emanuele : Nzambi udi netu (shap. 1. 23).

Mukaji wa tshikadilu tshimpe udi wangatshisha bayende bimpe. Mu matuku a mukalenge Lemuele, mulume uvua ne mukaji wa tshikadilu tshimpe uvua ‘mumanyibue ku bibuelelu bia ku musoko.’ (Nsu 31:23) Lelu, balume ba kunemeka batu balua bakulu anyi basadidi ba mudimu. Buobu basele, dikuatshisha ne bienzedi bimpe bia bakaji babu ke biabambuluisha bua kukumbajabu mudimu wabu bimpe. (1Tm 3:4, 11) Bakaji ba mushindu eu batu babanyisha bikole kudi babayabu ne kudi bena mu tshisumbu.
Mukaji wa tshikadilu tshimpe udi wambuluisha bayende padiye:
umukankamija ne mêyi mimpe.—Nsu 31:26
umukuatshisha bua akumbaje midimu yende ya mu tshisumbu.—1Ts 2:7, 8
usanka ne bidiye nabi.—1Tm 6:8
kayi umuebeja bua amuambile malu masokoka a tshisumbu.—1Tm 2:11, 12; 1Pt 4:15

Mukanda eu neukuambuluishe bua kulonga Dîyi dia Nzambi bimpe. Nkonko idi ne maleta mafikisha bikole. Mvese idibu bafile ku ndekelu kua tshikoso tshionso idi ileja muaba wa kupetela mandamuna a nkonko eyi mu Bible webe.
Paudi ubala mvese eyi, ukebe mua kumvua mudiyi yandamuna nkonko ayi. Ntemu wa Yehowa yonso neikale ne disanka dia kukuambuluisha bua kumvua mvese eyi bimpe.
Dimanyisha: Mikanda yonso idibu batele mu broshire eu mmipatula kudi Bantemu ba Yehowa.
Manya malu makuabu
PROGRAME WA DILONGA DIA BIBLE
Pa buloba bujima, Bantemu ba Yehowa mbamanyike bua mudimu wabu wa dilongesha bantu Bible kabayi babafutshisha kantu. Dimuena nkayebe.

“NZAMBI udi Nyuma,” kena umueneka ku mêsu kua bantu to. (Yone 4:24) Kadi Bible udi wamba ne: bamue bantu bakadi bamone Nzambi mu mushindu kampanda. (Ebelu 11:27) Mmunyi mudibi mua kuenzeka? Udiku bulelela mua kumona “Nzambi udi kayi umueneka” anyi?—Kolosayi 1:15.
Tudifuanyikijabi ne muntu udibu balele muikale mpofu. Dibenga kumona diende didiku mua kumupangisha bua kumanya malu adi bantu badi bamunyunguluke benza anyi? Tòo. Mpofu utu umvua malu mu mishindu ya bungi idi imuambuluisha bua kumanya

a umuepele mulela wa Nzambi, wakalua “mêsu” etu mu diulu. Kudiye ke kutudi mua kumanyina bimpe malu adi atangila Nzambi udi kayi umueneka.
Mona malu makese avua Yezu uvua muenze bidimu bipite bungi ne Tatuende mumvuije bua Nzambi:
Nzambi udi wenza mudimu kayi ulekela. “Tatu wanyi udi wenza mudimu too ne mpindieu.”—Yone 5:17.
Nzambi mmumanye majinga etu. “Tatu wenu, mmumanye binudi nabi dijinga kumpala mene kua nuenu kumulombabi.”—Matayi 6:8.
Nzambi udi utupesha biakudia. “Tatu wenu wa mu diulu, 
... (2422 chars skipped) ...
ale. Kumpala uvua wakula “malu avuaye kayi mujingulule bimpe.” (Yobo 42:3) Kadi panyima pa yeye mumane kutangila bimpe bifukibua bia Nzambi bidi bikemesha, biakamusaka bua kuamba ne: ‘Ngakumvua lumu luebe diambedi anu ku matshi, kadi mpindieu mêsu anyi akukumona.’—Yobo 42:5.
‘Biwakeba Yehowa, neumupete’
Nansha wewe pebe udi mua kuamba nunku. ‘Biwakeba Yehowa, neumupete.’ (1 Kulondolola 28:9) Bantemu ba Yehowa nebikale ne disanka dia kukuambuluisha bua kukeba Nzambi udi kayi umueneka ne kumupeta.

NZAMBI mmulongoluele bantu bualu buimpe butambe. Wakafuka mulume ne mukaji wa kumpala, Adama ne Eva, bua basombele mu budimi bulengele. Uvua mulongolole bua balele bana, bavuije buloba bujima mparadizu, ne balame nyama.—Genese 1:28; 2:8, 9, 15; tangila Dimanyisha dia ku ndekelu 6.

etu bonso tudi ne disungula dia kuenza. Tudi mua kusungula bua kulonga malu a Yehowa ne kumuenzela mudimu, anyi tudi mua kuenza anu tshitudi tuetu basue. Tuetu basungule bua kuenzela Yehowa mudimu, tudi mua kupeta nsombelu mutambe buimpe mu matuku atshilualua. Pavua muntu mukuabu mulombe Yezu bua amuvuluke panyima pa lufu luende, Yezu wakamulaya ne: “Newikale nanyi mu Mparadizu.” (Luka 23:43) Tukonkonone malu a bungi adi atangila Yezu Kristo ne muakumbajaye malu matambe buimpe adi Nzambi mulaye.

Yehowa wafuanegesele athu nu mabundu a figi
24:5
Mukatshi dia enya Yuda akhalele mu uhiga gu Babilona, anyi amonesele gujinginyina gudi Nzambi akhalele gifua mabundu a figi abonga
24:8
Fumu Sedesiase nu athu ako akhalelego agujinginyina gudi Yehowa, akhalele gifua mabundu a figi abola
Luholo lutshi tuajiya gukhala nu “mutshima” wa gujiya Yehowa?
24:7
Gila tudi mulonguga Mbimbi ya Nzambi nu guyikalegela, Yehowa mbawutuhana ‘mutshima’ wa gumujiya
Tudi naye guditala muabonga mu mitshima yetu ha gukatula matangi nu nzala jiajiya gubolesa ufuta wetu nu Yehowa
Dihule egi: Ngudi nu ‘mutshima wa gujiya’ Yehowa ba? Luholo lutshi ngajiya guheta mutshima wene?

Tudi bafume mu bisamba, miakulu ne bilele bishilashilangane, kadi tudi badisangishe bua bipatshila bimue. Tshia kumpala, tudi basue kutumbisha Yehowa, Nzambi muena Bible ne mufuki wa bintu bionso. Tudi tuenza muetu muonso bua kuidikija Yezu Kristo ne tudi ne disanka dia kubikidibua bena Kristo. Yonso wa kutudi utu ne tshibidilu tshia kuambuluisha bantu bua kulonga malu adi mu Bible ne Bukalenge bua Nzambi. Bu mutudi tuyisha anyi tuakula bua Yehowa Nzambi ne bua Bukalenge buende, mbatumanye bu Bantemu ba Yehowa.
Keba amue malu mu adrese wetu. Bala Bible ku Enternete. Keba bua kutumanya bimpe ne kumanya malu atudi tuitabuja.

Bintu bya kala byabadi bafumbule abishinkamisha naminyi’shi Belshasare baadi nfumu mu Babilone?
MUNDA mwa bipwa bibungi, bantu abatopekaa myanda ya mu Bible abadi abamba’shi Nfumu Belshasare, abadi batemune mu mukanda wa Ndanyele, tabadi kwanka. (Nda. 5:1) Babadi abamba byabya mwanda bantu abakimbulaa bintu bya kala tababadi na mushindo wa kushinkamisha’shi badi kwanka. Anka, bino binangu bibashintulukile mu 1854. Bwakinyi?
Mu kyakya kipwa nfumu a mu Grande-Bretagne abetamina bu J.G. Taylor badi
... (381 chars skipped) ... 
edi Belshasare’shi, bekale na muwa mafuku ebungi. Mpa na baba abadi abele mpaka mbafikye mu kukumiina’shi: Bino bintu abishinkamisha’shi Belshasare badi kwanka.
Anka, Bible ta mwambe penda’shi Belshasare badi kwanka, kadi amba dingi’shi badi nfumu. Dingi, baba abadi abele mpaka tababadi nka bakumine nya. Kileshesho, mu siekele a 19, mungi mwina sianse abetamina bu William Talbot bafundjile’shi bangi abamba’shi: “Bel-sar-ussur [Belshasare] badi mudye bufumu pamune na nshaaye Nabonide. Kadi pabita
... (381 chars skipped) ...
shasare ku bufumu, amupa kipindji kikata kya basalayi baaye.” Bino abilesha’shi Belshasare badi bu nfumu a kabidi mu Babilone mu aa mafuku. Byabya, muntu akimbulaa bintu bya kala na mulongye myanda itale ndimi abetamina bu Alan Millard bambile’shi, bibadi bilombane bwa’shi “mukanda wa Ndanyele witamine Belshasare bu ‘nfumu.’”
Eyendo’shi, bwa bafubi b’Efile Mukulu, bishinkamisho bya’shi mukanda wa Ndanyele ngwa kukulupila na nguyokyele n’Efile Mukulu abisanganyibwa mu Bible namwinyi.—2 Tim. 3:16.

Mmalu kayi adi Bible utulongesha?
Mbenze mukanda wa kulonga nawu Bible eu bua kukuambuluisha bua kumanya tshidi Bible wamba bua biena-bualu bishilashilangane, bu mudi bua tshinyi tudi tukenga, tshidi tshituenzekela patudi tufua, mua kuikala ne nsombelu wa disanka mu dîku, ne malu makuabu.
Udi mua kudiebeja bua tshinyi lelu kudi ntatu ya bungi nunku. Bible udi ulongesha ne: mu katupa kîpi emu, Nzambi neumbushe ntatu idi nayi bantu bu mudi makenga, masama, ne lufu.
NSHAPITA WA 7
Ukadiku mufuishe muntu uudi munange anyi? Kudiku mushindu wa kumumona kabidi anyi? Manya tshidi Bible ulongesha bua dibishibua dia bantu ku lufu.
NSHAPITA WA 9
Mona mudi malu adi bantu badi batunyunguluke benza, ne lungenyi ludibu nalu bileja ne: tudi mu tshikondo tshia kumpala kua nshikidilu wa bulongolodi ebu, anu mukavua Bible muambe.
NSHAPITA WA 10
Bible udi usokolola bulelela pa bidi bitangila banjelu ne bademon. Bifukibua bia mu nyuma ebi bituku bushuwa anyi? Bidiku mua kutuambuluisha anyi kutuenzela bibi anyi?
NSHAPITA WA 11
Bantu ba bungi badi bela meji ne: Nzambi ke udi ukebesha makenga onso adi pa buloba. Wewe udi wela meji kayi? Manya tshidi Nzambi wamba bua tshidi tshikebesha makenga.
NSHAPITA WA 18
Mmalu kayi adi muntu ne bua kukumbaja bua kubatijibua bua kulua muena Kristo? Mona tshidi batismo umvuija ne mushindu udibu ne bua kubatizangana.
